title: PLAY_ENTITY_ANIM
content:
0x7FB218262B8107010x878753D5// PlayEntityAnim
BOOL PLAY_ENTITY_ANIM(Entity entity, char* animName, char* animDict, float fBlendDelta, BOOL bLoop, BOOL bHoldLastFrame, BOOL bDriveToPose, float fStartPhase, int iFlags);Parameters:entity: The entity handle to play the animation on.animName: The name of the animation to play.animDict: The name of the animation dictionary to use.fBlendDelta: Blend in and out time.bLoop: Sets AF_LOOPING in the flags.bHoldLastFrame: Sets AF_HOLD_LAST_FRAME in the flags.bDriveToPose: unusedfStartPhase: Clamped between 0.0 and 1.0. Sets the start phase of the animation.iFlags: The flags to use when playing the animation. See TASK_PLAY_ANIM.Animations list
codeBlocks:
// PlayEntityAnim
BOOL PLAY_ENTITY_ANIM(Entity entity, char* animName, char* animDict, float fBlendDelta, BOOL bLoop, BOOL bHoldLastFrame, BOOL bDriveToPose, float fStartPhase, int iFlags);
